justification: The resume does not contain any relevant leadership experience in business development or sales functions, which warrants a low leadership score.
The candidate lacks direct experience in business development or B2B sales, specifically in the IT and manufacturing sectors.
The candidate's skills in research are not directly applicable to market research for sales and business development.
The JD requires proficiency in B2B sales and strategic business planning, which are not evident in the candidate's experience.

requirements.criteria: Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries

input.job_description:
### Join Apex Global Solutions as a Business Development Manager  

Apex Global Solutions is seeking a dedicated Business Development Manager to bolster our B2B sales efforts and enhance our market presence. This role requires a strategic thinker with the ability to forge and maintain robust client relationships, lead market analysis, and drive revenue growth through innovative sales strategies.

#### Key Responsibilities  
- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to meet organizational goals.
- Identify and qualify new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Lead market research to determine new market segments and customer needs.
- Foster long-term relationships with clients through successful engagement and collaboration.
- Track and report on key business metrics, providing insights and data-driven recommendations to executive leadership.
- Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and excellence in service delivery.

#### Required Skills  
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proven experience in B2B sales and marketing, particularly in IT and manufacturing sectors.
- Proficient in market research and data analysis.
- Strong leadership and project management capabilities.

#### Benefits  
- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Health and wellness benefits package.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.

Join us to spearhead business growth initiatives that deliver significant value and drive our mission forward.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
input.resume:
MUHAMMAD AAMIR GULZAR  
 
Phone:  +92-341-8492532    Email : amirgulzar328@gmail.com          Address:  Rawalpindi , Pakistan  
 
Seeking opportunities in a forward -thinking organization to leverage my skills and knowledge in computer 
science for personal and professional growth while making meaningful contributions to the company . 
 
EDUCATION  
FAST National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences                                       Islamabad, Pakistan  
MS Computer Science                                    CGPA: 3.87/4                                                             2021 -2024  
PMAS Arid Agriculture University                                                                                         Rawalpindi, Pakistan  
BS Computer Science                                     CGPA: 3.78/4                                                              2017 -2021  
 
EXPERI ENCE 
• Research Assistant  
I actively contributed to some R&D projects at DataInsight Research Lab including  Handwritten  
Medical Prescriptions Digitization and LLMs  and fine -tuning  and knowledge distillation . I also led 
a summer internship  in the lab , provided  guidance and supervision  to machine learning intern ees. 
• Teaching Experience  
I joined FAST -NUCES in September 2021. I have taught subjects like Programming Fundamentals,  
Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning as a Lecturer at FAST -NUCES. This experience helped  
me to develop strong instructional skills and gained knowledge in various fields . 
• Machine Learning Engineer  
I joined Skyline Systems (a sister company of PlanetBeyond) as a ML Engineer in July 2023. I am  
now working here as a Machine Learning team leader. It enhanced my skills in implementing  
cutting -edge solutions in machine learning . 
 
RESEARCH WORK  
• Skin Disease Detection and Classification Book Chapter (Under Review)  
Researching dermatology, aiming to contribute a chapter to a book focusing on innovative 
medical image analysis.  
• Master's Thesis: Data Extraction from Line Charts  
Thesis focuses on numeric data extraction from printed line charts, ready for submission to a Q1 
Journal.  
• Journal Paper in Progress: Medical Handwritten Prescriptions Digitization . 
Engaged in pioneering research on digitizing medical prescriptions, leveraging advanced 
computer vision techniques to address healthcare documentation challenges.  
PROJECTS  
• Question Answering on SEC filings Using RAG                                                              (NLU, LLM, RAG)  
Developed an application leveraging RAG pipeline for question -answering on financial data from 
SEC filings. Included user -friendly web interface highlighting relevant text chunks for answers. 
Utilized llamaindex for text chunking and PGVector for storage, ensuring efficient information 
handling.  • AI Companion Development                                                                       (NLP, LLM, Prompt Engineering ) 
Developed an AI companion by testing multiple open -source models. Conducted prompt 
engineering and instruction -level fine -tuning on Llama 3.1 8B and Gemma 2 9B models, achieving 
superior performance for our use case. Successfully implemented this on resour ce-limited 
computational infrastructure available locally in our lab.  
• Tumor Classification in Healthcare                                                  (Medical Imaging, Computer Vision)  
Worked on tumor classification focusing on MSS and MSI. Explored foundation models in 
computational pathology like UNI and CONCH. Fine -tuned these models for our specific tasks, 
enhancing explainability and interoperability of our approaches, contributing to advancements in 
medical diagnostics.  
• SemiCOL: Semi -supervised learning for colorectal cancer detection            (Computer Vision)  
Developed an innovative approach for colorectal cancer detection using semi -supervised learning. 
Implemented advanced techniques and deep learning models to accurately detect and segment 
cancerous regions in medical images, providing valuable expertise in medical image analysis.  
• Social Media Profile Analysis: Counting People with Similar Features          (Big Data Analytics ) 
Analyzed social media profile data using Apache Hadoop MapReduce algorithms to count people 
with similar features. Demonstrated creativity in proposing and implementing data preprocessing 
and analysis tasks, gaining hands -on experience with large -scale dat asets . 
TRAINING S AND CERTIFICATION S 
Generative AI with Large Language Models                              DeepLearning.AI (Coursera)      
Introduction to Generative AI                                                      Google Cloud (Coursera)  
Big Data Specialization                                                                  University of California, San Diego  (Coursera)  
Introduction to Deep Learning                                                      MIT (Introtodeeplearning.com)  
Machine Learning in a Data Driven Business Environment      IEEE Xplore Library  
Machine Learning in the Age of Enterprise Big Data                 IEEE Xplore Library  
OTHER CERTIFICATION S 
Certificate of participation in PAKISTAN 100 ENTERPRENEURIAL BOOTCAMP 2021           IdeaGist, 2021  
Certificate of Attendance on Integr ating  IEEE  eLearning Courses into your teaching          IEEE  
Certificate of Participation in Creating Right Entrepreneurial Eco -System in Pakistan       LIFT, Pakistan  
TECHNICAL SKILLS  
• Proficient in programming languag es: C, C++, Python, Java  with debugging expertise.  
• Skilled in SQL and NoSQL databases, data integration, and big data frameworks like Apache 
Hadoop and Spark.  
• Experienced in data analysis using Python and SQL, with knowledge of statistical techniques and 
data visualization.  
• Experienced in exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and creating visual 
representations using tools like Tableau and Power BI.  
• Experienced in machine learning concepts, algorithms, and libraries like Numpy, Pandas, Scipy, 
scikit -learn , Keras , Pytorc h and TensorFlow etc.  ML models optimizations and deployment.  
• Experienced in deep learni ng tasks like  NLP, Computer Vision, Automatic Speech Recognition  
(ASR) models, and building neural networks  for various tasks  like CNNs, RNN and LSTM.  
• Skilled in generative AI tasks like LLMs  fine-tuning , Prompt Engineering, Retrieval Augmented 
Generation (RAG)  using llamaindex, langchain  and Vision tasks using diffusers, etc.
